name: Bug Invaders (itch)
description:
NOTE: If you lose window focus, click on the fullscreen button to regain focus

A simple arcade infinite shooter where you shoot bugs before they can reach the bottom. There maybe times where you fail, resulting in a partial loss of your life. However, with the loss comes the added bonus of an INTERMISSION mode, where you have special abilities to play the level better. 

I have also added an online leaderboard which you can find here or from in-game.

NOTE: Click on the screen when it says 'Ready to Play'
